comments.body: Wonder if it wouldn't be cleaner to just make storageLevel a "var" instead. Is the original storageLevel ever used for anything?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,7 @@ class RDDInfo(
   var memSize = 0L
   var diskSize = 0L
   var tachyonSize = 0L
+  var _storageLevel = storageLevel

comments.body:
i agree with you, so i will change it.
another reason to make storageLevel be a var is that the rdd information also use it. it should be updated, too.
https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/core/src/main/scala/org/apache/spark/storage/RDDInfo.scala#L37-L43
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -33,6 +33,7 @@ class RDDInfo(
   var memSize = 0L
   var diskSize = 0L
   var tachyonSize = 0L
+  var _storageLevel = storageLevel
